title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1436/98 of 3 July 1998 authorising certain additives in feedingstuffs (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1436/98 of 3 July 1998 authorising certain additives in feedingstuffs (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The substances belonging to the group 'enzymes` and listed in Annex I to this Regulation may be authorised as additives in animal nutrition under the conditions laid down in that Annex.
The substances belonging to the group 'micro-organisms` and listed in Annex II to this Regulation may be authorised as additives in animal nutrition under the conditions laid down in that Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
